items.content_html: Peek is a lightweight WebRTC-based screen sharing app built with vanilla JS, Node.js, and Tailwind CSS. It lets users share their screen in real-time over a unique session link, with optional stream quality controls.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client.
